text: Manipur Statehood Day Women's Polo Tournament 2020 or 5th Manipur Statehood Day Women's Polo Tournament is a Polo Tournament that was held in Imphal, Manipur. It was organised in Mapal Kangjeibung (Imphal Polo Ground), the oldest polo ground in the world. It is the first and the only women's polo tournament in India. Great Britain won the trophy after defeating USA by 5-2 goals. == Participants == * * * * * == References == Category:Polo competitions in Manipur Category:2020 in sports Category:Sport in India
title: Manipur Statehood Day Women's Polo Tournament 2020
